meanings.sent1: The apple looked bitten, with teeth marks on its skin.
meanings.sent2: The sandwich was bitten into by a hungry child.
meanings.sent3: The bitten cookie crumbled in the lunchbox, leaving crumbs everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The bitten pencil revealed the stress of the student's exam.
meanings.sent5: The bitten apple glistened in the sunlight, showing where someone had taken a bite.

meanings.definition: having been bitten by an insect or animal
meanings.sent1: The bitten arm swelled up after the mosquito attack.
meanings.sent2: The bitten hiker applied ointment to the red, itchy spots.
meanings.sent3: The bitten camper danced around trying to avoid more bug bites.
meanings.sent4: The bitten dog yelped in pain after the encounter with the snake.
meanings.sent5: The bitten fruit attracted flies, evidence of the insect's feast.
